name: POWER_XS_FUNC_PS_ON_ENTRY_EXIT
summary: Verify PS_ON signal or residency occurs or not, PS_ON is used to achieve the deeper power consumption than S0IX, PS_ON is only supported on Client desktop platform, which has ATS PSU Power source.  The aims of PS_ON is to turn off all the main rails of AC to DC power (PSU) by setting PS_ON# HIGH (turn off non-SB PSU rails)
